name: Potion Brewer
description:
Move around the map, encountering enemies and blasting them with spells to collect ingredients to combine to brew a perfect potion.

Controls: WASD to move, left click to shoot, numbers to switch spells when you unlock more.

Note: bring ingredients(tracked in top right) to the cauldron.

Source code: https://github.com/tristanphease/bevy-jam-2
